mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( code, password, name, gender, status, department_id, is_department_master, position, created_by, updated_by, created_at, updated_at, version ) VALUES ( #{code}, #{password}, #{name}, #{gender.value}, #{status.value}, #{departmentId}, #{isDepartmentMaster}, #{position}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, 1 )
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET name = #{name}, password = #{password}, gender = #{gender.value}, status = #{status.value}, department_id = #{departmentId}, is_department_master = #{isDepartmentMaster}, position = #{position}, updated_by = #{updatedBy}, updated_at = #{updatedAt}, version = version + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND version = #{version}
